export const getCustomTemplates=()=>{try{const stored=localStorage.getItem(CUSTOM_TEMPLATES_KEY);return stored?JSON.parse(stored):{};}catch(error){console.error('Error loading custom templates:',error);return{};}};// Function to get all templates (predefined + custom)
